net.sf.jasperreports.charts.design

Class JRDesignMultiAxisPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.base.JRBaseChartPlot
      • net.sf.jasperreports.charts.base.JRBaseMultiAxisPlot
        • net.sf.jasperreports.charts.design.JRDesignMultiAxisPlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, JRMultiAxisPlot, JRChangeEventsSupport, JRChartPlot, JRCloneable

    public class JRDesignMultiAxisPlot
extends JRBaseMultiAxisPlot
    Contains information on how a multiple axis chart should be displayed. This information overrides the display information for all the charts sharing the single domain axis in the multiple axis chart.
    Version:
    $Id: JRDesignMultiAxisPlot.java 5877 2013-01-07 19:51:14Z teodord $
    Author:
    Barry Klawans (bklawans@users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addAxis

        public void addAxis(JRChartAxis axis)
        Adds an axis to the plot. The axis contains the complete information on the data and rendering to use as well as where to draw the axis.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis to add to the plot
